Animal Facts

use these interesting animal facts in your next project.
Find out interesting facts about animals.


View on GitHub Read the Docs

Do you love animals?

Want a new API to play around with for your next project?


Animal Facts is a REST API that returns accurate researched facts about animals in json format. If you love animals, this is the API for you. It's awesome for learning/teaching purposes too. Try it out!

Endpoints

These are the 4 main endpoints available in Animal facts api:

GET: https://animalfactsapi.herokuapp.com/api-v1/all-facts.json
GET: https://animalfactsapi.herokuapp.com/api-v1/animal-fact/4.json
GET: https://animalfactsapi.herokuapp.com/api-v1/random-fact.json
GET: https://animalfactsapi.herokuapp.com/api-v1/search-animal.json

Note: Use the GET HTTP methods to get a response.

View details on Docs


Example code:

      
        const url = 'https://animalfactsapi.herokuapp.com/api-v1/all-facts.json';

        fetch(url).then((response)=>{
          return response.json();
        }).then(data=>{
          console.log(data);
        }).catch(function(error) {
          console.log(error);
        });
